name: Comelito full
description:
The comelitos have invaded the earth and only you can save the planet! Use power gems to destroy comelitos for a limited time and take all the gems in the levels to win and face king comelito, this is the complete game

the demo version is here: https://sivlesoft.itch.io/comelito-demo

To see the sivlesoft news, click here: http://sivlesoft.blogspot.com/
